mapper.select: SELECT hs.id, hs.hospitalno, hs.speciesno, s.sname, s.grp FROM hospital_species hs INNER JOIN species s ON hs.speciesno = s.speciesno WHERE hs.hospitalno = #{hospitalno} ORDER BY s.grp ASC, s.sname ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hospital_species WHERE hospitalno = #{hospitalno} AND speciesno = #{speciesno}
